actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a distribution deduction in the case of certain cemetery perpetual care fund trusts.

summary.text: Provides that amounts paid by a cemetery perpetual trust fund created pursuant to local law by a taxable cementery corporation, for the care and maintenance of cemetery property, shall be considered distributions for tax deduction purposes of the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a distribution deduction in the case of certain cemetery perpetual care fund trusts.
